title: Virtual Reality-Based Collaborative Language Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Course involving collaborative activities in a virtual reality environment to improve English communication skills for science-related job roles

learning_goals: Learners can communicate with peers using science-specific terminology in a virtual reality environment with at least 80% accuracy.
Students can apply at least three situational language use strategies by solving collaborative tasks in a 3D virtual space.
Students can produce and submit an English-language video explaining a science experiment using virtual reality in a project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
